completeDesc.cn: 探测信标是一种用于记录侵蚀读数的特殊设备，具有在普通侵蚀中持续收集信息的能力，但无法直接对抗侵蚀潮。
completeDesc.en: The detection beacon is a special device for logging Blight readings and can provide constant data gathering in normal Blighted environments. However, it is incapable of withstanding a Blight Tide directly.

desc.cn: 一处被侵蚀潮损坏的探测信标。需要收集信标当前的状态信息，协助天师府学院进行研究与改进工作。
desc.en: There is a detection beacon damaged by the Blight Tide. An update to the beacon's current status is required. Help the Tianshi Bureau Academy perform its research and improvement tasks.

name.en: Beacon Damaged in the Blight Tide

shotTargetName.cn: 拍摄侵蚀潮中损坏的信标
shotTargetName.en: Photograph the beacon damaged in the Blight Tide

completeDesc.cn: 蓄水源石虫往往成群出现在富水环境下，并表现出较强的活力。
completeDesc.en: Cistern Originium Slugs usually exist in groups in places with abundant water and tend to be unusually active.

desc.cn: 蓄水源石虫在不同生态环境下，或独行或群聚。需要进行信息收集，协助天师府学院完善对这一现象的研究。
desc.en: Cistern Originium Slugs either live independently or in groups depending on the local ecology or environment. Additional information is required by the Tianshi Bureau Academy to learn more about such phenomena.

shotTargetName.en: Photograph a group of Cistern Originium Slugs

completeDesc.cn: 早期的动力竹筏会惊扰到水中的生物，随着调试器的覆盖普及，包括七彩鳞在内的水生生物恢复到了原有的规模。
completeDesc.en: Early powered rafts tend to disturb the aquatic wildlife. However, as modulators become more popular, the population of many aquatic organisms, including rainbow fins, have rebounded to their original sizes.

desc.cn: 动力竹筏上装有避免惊扰水中生物的调试器。需要收集动力竹筏行驶时七彩鳞的反应，协助天师府学院改进调试器。
desc.en: Powered bamboo rafts have been furnished with modulators to avoid disturbing aquatic organisms. Actual responses by rainbow fins towards a working bamboo raft are still required to help the Tianshi Bureau Academy make improvements to the modulators.

shotTargetName.en: Photograph the rainbow fin in the water

completeDesc.cn: 设立室内试验田是为了挑选出更适宜在人造环境中种植的苗株，满足在极端环境种植作物的需要。
completeDesc.en: The aim of setting up the indoor testing plot is to select plant varieties that grow better in artificial environments and identify crop cultivars capable of growing in extreme environments.

desc.cn: 室内试验田的观测设备因维修无法使用。需要收集试验田作物的当前状态信息，协助天师府学院进行数据分析。
desc.en: The indoor testing plot video cameras are down for maintenance. Gather information on the current status of the test plots to help the Tianshi Bureau Academy analyze their data.

completeDesc.cn: 这棵古树在观测站建成前便已经存在于这片小水潭上，它本身构成的微生态系统可以反映当地受侵蚀影响的程度。
completeDesc.en: This ancient tree has been growing in this tiny pond even before the monitoring center was built. The mini-ecosystem it sustains can help reflect the levels of local Blight.

desc.cn: 古树最近发出了一些很奇怪的声响。需要进行信息收集，协助观测站对该区域进行生态监测。
desc.en: Strange noises have been recently heard near the Ancient Tree. More information is required to help the monitoring center keep track of the local ecology.

shotTargetName.cn: 拍摄生长在小水潭上的古树
shotTargetName.en: Photograph the ancient tree in the small lake

completeDesc.cn: 随着新天师桩的部署，一些位置已不再关键的天师桩会被放弃，若不对当地生态造成影响便不会考虑搬移。
completeDesc.en: As new Tianshi Pillars are deployed, older structures no longer at critical locations would be abandoned. They would only be removed if they exert undesirable influences to the local ecosystem.

desc.cn: 一个被弃用的天师桩。需要收集生长在倒塌天师桩上的植被信息，协助对“是否有必要搬移倒塌天师桩”的调查评估。
desc.en: There is an abandoned Tianshi Pillar. Information is required about epiphytes growing on the collapsed structure to help determine the "necessity in removing the collapsed Tianshi Pillar".

completeDesc.cn: 关于先有树还是先有亭的争论从未停止，但唯一可以确认的是，这棵树承载了许许多多武陵人的过往记忆。
completeDesc.en: People are still arguing which of these came first, the tree or the pavilion. But one thing remains true: The tree is a centerpiece in the memories of many Wulingers.

desc.cn: 一棵长在亭子中间，有着粉色叶子的树木。需要进行信息收集，协助观测站对“栖霞驻影”突然大量落叶的调查。
desc.en: There is a pink-leafed tree growing in a certain pavilion. More information is needed to help the monitoring center determine the cause behind the sudden leaf drop of the "Eternal Sunset".

shotTargetName.cn: 拍摄生长在亭子中间的“栖霞驻影”
shotTargetName.en: Photograph the "Eternal Sunset" growing in the middle of the pavilion

completeDesc.cn: 传说曾有一位天师，在这里悟出自己技艺的本真后，将一颗种子放入石壁，承载这段过往的种子，便是“漱玉”。
completeDesc.en: Legend speaks of a Tianshi who attained the ultimate truth of his technical arts in this location. He then planted a seed into the stone wall. Being a vessel of the past, the seed later grew and became the "Cleansing Jade".

desc.cn: 一棵长在石柱侧面，有着白色叶子的树木。需要进行信息收集，协助观测站对“‘漱玉’是否会垮塌”进行的调查。
desc.en: There is a white-leafed tree growing from the sides of a stone pillar. More information is required to help the monitoring center determine if "the 'Cleansing Jade' is falling off".

shotTargetName.cn: 拍摄在石柱上侧向生长的“漱玉”
shotTargetName.en: Photograph the "Cleansing Jade" growing out of a pillar
